title: Giro d’Italia Startlist: Roglič, Bernal, Ayuso, Wout van Aert, Pidcock, Pedersen Headline Glittering Lineup
content:
With the Giro starting next Friday, the entry list for the season’s first grand tour is deep and diverse.

Read the full article at Giro d’Italia Startlist: Roglič, Bernal, Ayuso, Wout van Aert, Pidcock, Pedersen Headline Glittering Lineup on Velo.
